section.12: The Book of The At-Tatbiq (Clasping One's Hands Together)

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn Buhainah that:The Prophet (ï·º) prayed and stood up following the first two rak'ahs, and they said (SubhanAllah). He carried on, then when he finished his prayer he performed two prostrations, then he said the Salam
